channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Say goodbye to the 4 p.m. closing bell: Your stocks are becoming 24/7 digital cash
item.description: Tokenized equities — real shares of stock wrapped or reissued as blockchain tokens — threaten traditional brokerages.

item.title: Wayfair’s stock sinks, as investors worry expansion plans will hurt profits
item.description: Wayfair’s stock was suffering its worst postearnings reaction in nearly four years, after the company unexpectedly swung to a net loss for the latest quarter and warned that profit margins may narrow.

item.title: Walmart’s stock rallies after CFO indicates profit outlook will likely be raised
item.description: Shares of Walmart rallied Thursday after the company indicated that the downbeat profit outlook it had provided was basically a way for the retail behemoth to underpromise so it could overdeliver.
